VARDESC: Has your household income changed significantly since February 2020? (please EXCLUDE a stimulus payment from the federal government if you have received one)
VALUES: 1 = Yes, my household income is more
column18: 2 = Yes, my household income is less
column19: 3 = No, my household income is about the same

VARDESC: How worried are you that your household income has been or will be negatively impacted the coronavirus (COVID-19) and its effects?
How worried are you that the value of your assets (including housing, savings, and other financial assets) has been or will be negatively impacted by the coronavirus (COVID-19) and its effects?
In the past month, how difficult has it been for you to cover your expenses and pay all your bills?

Suppose now you have an emergency expense that costs $400. Based on your current financial situation, how would you pay this expense? By putting it on my credit card and paying it off in full at the next statement
COMMENT1: ASK IF 'In the past month, how difficult has it been for you to cover your expenses and pay all your bills?' = 'Not at all difficult' OR 'In the past month, how difficult has it been for you to cover your expenses and pay all your bills?' = 'Don't know'

VARDESC: Suppose now you have an emergency expense that costs $400. Based on your current financial situation, how would you pay this expense? By putting it on my credit card and paying it off over time
COMMENT1: ASK IF 'In the past month, how difficult has it been for you to cover your expenses and pay all your bills?' = 'Not at all difficult' OR 'In the past month, how difficult has it been for you to cover your expenses and pay all your bills?' = 'Don't know'
